messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm moving to Solano County, CA
messages.msgSnippet: On Wed, 20 Nov 2002 12:10:41 -0800 Betsy  ... We re maybe an hour away from Vallejo, but we go to Davis all the time and that s more
messages.messageBody:
On Wed, 20 Nov 2002 12:10:41 -0800 Betsy <ecsamhill@...>
writes:
> My husband has been offered a teaching job in Vallejo, CA, so it looks
> like we will be moving to that area in about a month.

We're maybe an hour away from Vallejo, but we go to Davis all the time
and that's more like half an hour. Or you can come up to our farm :-)

Dar

messages.subject: I'm moving to Solano County, CA
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, everybody -- My husband has been offered a teaching job in Vallejo, CA, so it looks like we will be moving to that area in about a month. Does anyone know
messages.messageBody:
Hi, everybody --

My husband has been offered a teaching job in Vallejo, CA, so it looks
like we will be moving to that area in about a month.

Does anyone know any unschoolers or semi-unschoolers that live any where
near there?

I have some lovely homeschooling friends down here in San Jose and I am
going to miss seeing them regularly.

Betsy
